title: I'm Dating Superfly
itunes:title: I'm Dating Superfly
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m in my late 40s and I’m a puppeteer and I do stage plays at the children’s theater. I also teach theater at a community college and I work part-time in a vintage boutique. I just got out of a bad relationship, so I was just trying to stay busy but then, I met a slightly older man and I’m fascinated by him. He came into the boutique about 3 months ago and he told me he’s a thrift store fanatic because he likes clothes from the 60s and 70s...................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m in my late 40s and I’m a puppeteer and I do stage plays at the children’s theater. I also teach theater at a community college and I work part-time in a vintage boutique. I just got out of a bad relationship, so I was just trying to stay busy but then, I met a slightly older man and I’m fascinated by him. He came into the boutique about 3 months ago and he told me he’s a thrift store fanatic because he likes clothes from the 60s and 70s...................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
